name: Austria
startIntroPart1: Noble and virtuous Queen Maria Theresa, Holy Roman Empress and sovereign of Austria, your people bow to your gracious will. Following the death of your father, King Charles VI, you ascended to the throne of Austria during the time of great instability, but the empty coffers and diminished military did little to dissuade your ambitions. Faced with war almost immediately upon your succession to the throne, you managed to fend off your foes, and in naming your husband, Francis Stephen, co-ruler, assured your place as Empress of the Holy Roman Empire. During your reign, you guided Austria on a new path of reform - strengthening the military, replenishing the treasury, and improving the education system of the kingdom.
startIntroPart2: Oh great queen, bold and dignified, the time has come for you to rise and guide your kingdom once again. Can you return your people to the height of prosperity and splendor? Will you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: The archduchess of Austria welcomes your Eminence to... Oh let's get this over with! I have a luncheon at four o'clock.
tradeRequest: I see you admire my new damask. Nobody should say that I am an unjust woman. Let's reach an agreement!
uniques: Cost of purchasing items in cities reduced by [15]%

name: Denmark
startIntroPart1: Honor and glory be yours, Harald Bluetooth Gormsson, mighty heir of King Gorm of the Old and Thryra Dannebod. Not only were you victorious on the battlefield against the armies of Norway, you also completed massive construction project across the land - numerous Ring Fortresses to protect the populace from invasion and internal strife. You successfully drove off waves of German settlers in 983 AD and sheltered your kingdom from unwanted foreign influence.
startIntroPart2: Stalwart Viking, the time for greatness is upon you once more. You are called to rise up and lead your people to renewed power and trumph! Will you make the world shudder once more at the very thought of your great armies of the Northsmen? Will you let the Viking battle cry ring out across the crashing waved? Will you build a civilization to stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: Harad Bluetooth bids you welcome to his lands, a Viking unlike any the seas and lands have ever known! Hah, are you afraid?
tradeRequest: This is a fine deal! Even a drunk beggar would agree!
uniques: Units pay only 1 movement point to embark and disembark
Melee units pay no movement cost to pillage

name: England
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: Greetings. We are by the Grace of God, Victoria, Queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland. And soon, dare I say, the empire.
neutralHello: You have been most kind and attentive.
tradeRequest: Greetings. We have sent a Royal envoy on behalf of the United Kingdom. We hope they are well received.

name: France
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: I am Catherine, the Queen Mother of France, and I welcome you to the realm. I do so look forward to learning all there is to know about you.
hateHello: What would your friends think of this information?
tradeRequest: I have sent you a trade delegation with all of the customary gifts.

name: Germany
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: Greetings. I am the Holy Roman Emperor Frederick, King of Germany, Italy, Burgundy, and many others. I trust that you will rule your lands as I do: through might.
tradeRequest: We have sent a diplomatic envoy to you. Treat them as you would treat me.
uniqueText: All cities can construct 1 additional District

name: Greece
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: I am Gorgo, Queen of Sparta and leader of the Greeks. Who are you? What victories can you speak of?
neutralHello: I will tell you of Sparta.
hateHello: Your words are meaningless compared to our deeds.
tradeRequest: A Spartan delegation honors you with gifts. Accept them with honor.
uniques: Earn [50]% of [military] opponent's [Strength] as [Culture] for kills

name: Hungary
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: I am Matthias. I am King of Hungary, scourge of my foes, and defender of the faithful. Greetings.
neutralHello: I am glad to call you a friend.
tradeRequest: I am sending you gifts worthy of a prince.
uniqueText: +50% for districts and buildings in cities built along a river.

name: Netherlands
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: I am Wilhelmina, Queen of the Netherlands. It is my great pleasure to finally meet you.
neutralHello: May our relationship be long and prosperous.
hateHello: It is our fervent desire to tell you just how awful we find you.
tradeRequest: The Netherlands send you gifts of greeting.

name: Norway
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: Harald Sigurdsson stands before you: a Viking unlike any the seas and lands have ever known. Hah, are you afraid?
neutralHello: Friend? Yes, I am a friend.
hateHello: No, not for all the treasure in Asgard.
tradeRequest: I have sent you traders with gifts!
uniques: +[50]% Production when constructing [Water] units [in all cities]
Units pay only 1 movement point to embark and disembark

name: Poland
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: A meeting blessed by God, I am sure. I am Jadwiga the King of Greater Poland. Yes, a king.
hateHello: Evil cannot stay hidden for long.
tradeRequest: I have sent a trade delegation to you with gifts of pisanki. They have been blessed.

name: Portugal
startIntroPart1: Blessings be upon you, most gracious Queen Maria, protector and sovereign of the Portuguese people. As the first ever Queen regnant of Portugal, it was your wise stewardship that protected the royal court from the incursions of Napoleon, establishing a safe haven in Brazil to preserve the integrity of Portuguese rule. Despite struggling with illness throughout your reign, your effort to ensure Portugal's close cooperation with Brazil are credited with helping that state gain its eventual independence - and for this you will always be admired and respected by the people of both nations.
startIntroPart2: Oh noble and pious queen, will you once again guide the kingdom of Portugal in the spirit of cooperation and prosperity? Will you establish a new legacy, one that will surpass all those who come before you? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: I am Maria, Queen of Portugal! Have we met before? You look familiar to me... Or maybe not.

name: Scotland
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: I am Robert the Bruce. Scotland follows me—be it through fields of wheat or of battle.
tradeRequest: Please accept my people's finest gifts. Oh, and hark to the pipers! Are they not grand?

name: Spain
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: I am the King of Spain, Portugal, Sardinia and Sicily, Naples, Duke of Milan, etc., but most importantly, I am a devout follower of the one, true religion. I hope for your sake you are as well.
neutralHello: You have seen the wisdom in the light of the Lord.
hateHello: You are another Judas, sent to betray the Lord.
tradeRequest: I have sent a delegation to your city. Please, enjoy and welcome them kindly.
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Production] from each Trade Route

name: Sweden
declaringWar: Now it's time for some juicy fights !
introduction: I am Kristina, queen of Sweden, patron of arts and letters. Do I greet a fellow lover of learning?
uniques: Provides a sum of gold each time you spend a Great Person
